## ToolboxItem.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `ToolboxItem` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(toolboxItemDef: toolbox.ToolboxItemInfo, parentToolbox: IToolbox, opt_parent?: ICollapsibleToolboxItem);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toolboxItemDef | [toolbox.ToolboxItemInfo](./blockly.utils_namespace.toolbox_namespace.toolboxiteminfo_typealias.md) | The JSON defining the toolbox item. |
|  parentToolbox | [IToolbox](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.md) | The toolbox that holds the toolbox item. |
|  opt\_parent | [ICollapsibleToolboxItem](./blockly.icollapsibletoolboxitem_interface.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The parent toolbox item or null if the category does not have a parent. |
